title: Youzee Diaspora
text:
August 2012, Youzee, one of the shiniest stars on the spanish tech scene goes Nova.
Three years after that, all the product team is distributed around the world.


The raw data can be found here, so if you want to add any update, feel free to pull request a change :)

data.name: Automattic
data.desc: Automattic projects include WordPress.com, Jetpack, Gravatar, VaultPress, and Akismet.

data.name: TransferWise
data.desc: TransferWise is an Estonian developed and UK-based peer-to-peer money transfer service launched in January 2011

data.name: Google
data.desc: Google is an American multinational corporation specializing in Internet-related services and products. These include online advertising technologies, search, cloud computing, and software

data.name: Viaplay
data.desc: Viaplay Corporation is a leading provider of smart control devices geared towards smart TV applications.

data.name: TAPTAP Networks
data.desc: TAPTAP Networks is the largest independent mobile advertising company in Spain

data.name: Atlassian
data.desc: Atlassian is a leading provider of collaboration software for teams with products including JIRA, Confluence, HipChat, Bitbucket and Stash

data.name: Ticketea
data.desc: Ticketea is a hispanophone DIY ticketing platform enabling small and mid-sized event organizers to promote activities and sell tickets.

data.name: Packlink
data.desc: PackLink is an online platform that offers cost-effective package delivery services in Spain and internationally.

data.name: QDQ
data.desc: QDQ offers a line of web design and online marketing services especially geared at local SMBs

data.name: Monkimun
data.desc: Monkimun is an award-winning company that makes Language Learning for Kids fun.

data.name: Jobandtalent
data.desc: jobandtalent is a service that compares available job opportunities with subscribed professionals and sends automated alerts to notify them.

data.name: Avature
data.desc: Avature is a highly flexible enterprise SaaS platform for Global Talent Acquisition and Talent Management, provider of CRM for recruiting.

data.name: Tuenti
data.desc: Tuenti Technologies is a Spanish social networking site allowing users to send real-time messages.
